```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)

```

### s
```{r fig.height=20, fig.width=2.5}
# Data downloaded from
#t_path <- here::here("data", "yearly_ops_all_airports.xlsx") 
t <- read.csv(here::here("data", "merged_ops_delay.csv"))

ggplot(t, aes(x = year)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 1000000), labels = scales::comma) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c(2004, 2018)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = ops)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = year, y = ops, color = Prop_On_Time)) +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(airport), scales = "free")

ggplot(t, aes(x = year)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(2004, 2018)) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = Actual_Arrivals, ymin = On_Time_Arrivals), color = "steelblue", fill = "steelblue") +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(airport), scales = "free_y")
```

### Las Vegas plot
```{r}
ap <- "LAS"

apt <- t %>% filter(airport == ap) %>%
  mutate(exp_date = as_date(2012))

ggplot(apt, aes(x = year)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(2004, 2018)) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = Actual_Arrivals, ymin = On_Time_Arrivals), color = "steelblue", fill = "steelblue") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 2012) +
  labs(title = "Before- and After-Expansion Capacity at LAS", 
       subtitle = "Upper limit of ribbon shows total arrivals / lower limit shows on-time arrivals",
       x = "Year", 
       y = "Arrivals")
```
